title: How to Download the New Xbox 360 Dashboard Without Xbox Live

steps.headline: Decide whether you would like to burn a CD/DVD or use a USB flash drive.
steps.description: (The flash drive is easier, faster, and rewritable.)

steps.headline: Go to this site and scroll down until you get to the bit which says To create a DVD or CD.
steps.description: Click the download link. Make sure you don't change the file name when you save it.

steps.headline: Right click on the zipped folder and click Extract all once it is successfully downloaded.
steps.description: Then copy the extracted file onto a flash drive, or burn a CD.

steps.headline: Turn on your Xbox 360 console and plug in the flash drive or insert the CD.
steps.description: There should be a box that should ask if you want to update. Choose the yes option.

steps.headline: Watch the intro video play once it has been updated.
Enjoy the new Dashboard.
steps.description: More options can be found by pressing the Guide button on your controller.

text: Decide whether you would like to burn a CD/DVD or use a USB flash drive. (The flash drive is easier, faster, and rewritable.) Go to this site and scroll down until you get to the bit which says To create a DVD or CD. Click the download link. Make sure you don't change the file name when you save it. Right click on the zipped folder and click Extract all once it is successfully downloaded. Then copy the extracted file onto a flash drive, or burn a CD. Turn on your Xbox 360 console and plug in the flash drive or insert the CD. There should be a box that should ask if you want to update. Choose the yes option. Watch the intro video play once it has been updated.  Enjoy the new Dashboard. More options can be found by pressing the Guide button on your controller.
